competitors.name: VMware
competitors.notes: Early virtualization leader with vSphere; HCI just emerging

competitors.name: HPE
competitors.notes: Traditional server and storage provider; SimpliVity acquired later 2017

context: 2010 was when Nutanix was founded. The HCI market was just emerging, and Nutanix was among the pioneers pushing HCI into enterprise mainstream. Competitors were primarily in separate server, storage, and virtualization markets. VMware dominated virtualization with vSphere.
